api_list.api_description: Retrieve the favicon for a specified domain. Optionally, specify the size of the favicon image.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: The domain to retrieve the favicon from.

optional_parameters.name: sz
optional_parameters.description: A size hint for the favicon (e.g., 128, 256). Defaults to None, which returns the default size (usually 16x16).

api_list.api_description: Get WHOIS data for a given domain name.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain name for the WHOIS lookup.

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Response format, valid values: json | xml.

query: Could you find the favicon for the domain 'wikipedia.org'? Also, I'd like to know the WHOIS details of the domain 'example.com'.
